snippet: First Joshua Linson knocked out the lights. Then he knocked out Winston-Salem State, ending a basketball game that took three days to complete....

headline.print_headline: 40 Hours Later, Tie Basketball Game Finally Ends
headline.main: 40 Hours Later, Tie Basketball Game Finally Ends

lead_paragraph: First Joshua Linson knocked out the lights. Then he knocked out Winston-Salem State, ending a basketball game that took three days to complete.
